mean_cn: n. ［医］淋巴，淋巴液，（淋巴液似的）浆，苗
mean_en: a pale fluid that contains white blood cells and that passes through channels in the body and helps to keep bodily tissues healthy
sentence: The body's lymph nodes contain some of the most important parts of the immune system.
sentence_trans: 人体的淋巴结包含一些最重要的免疫系统部位。
